title: MSFS 2024 Sim Update 3 FINAL Build? üöÄ Performance investigation & Bug Fixes Breakdown!
description:
Sim Update 3 Beta 1.5.9.0 has landed for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, and the big question on everyone's mind is: could this be the final build? In this in-depth video, we're dissecting the official release notes from June 20th, 2025. We'll discuss the crucial changes related to performance, analyzing if this update finally delivers the smooth flying experience we've been hoping for, before diving into all the individual fixes.

But that's not all! We'll also break down the June 19th, 2025 Development Update, with a keen eye on the current MSFS 2024 bug status and the community wish list. Join us as we discuss whether this build truly marks the completion of Sim Update 3! Is your simulator ready for takeoff with these new changes?

üí¨ Are you experiencing any stability problems with MSFS 2024 lately? Share your insights and questions in the comments section!
